events.name: Workshop
events.eligibility: Open to all registered students (limited seats, first-come first-served)
requirements: Bring your own laptop with required software pre-installed
Software details will be emailed to registered participants
guidelines: Maintain silence and decorum during sessions

events.name: Prompt to Product
events.overview: Transform a prompt into a tangible product using AI tools in just 3 hours!
format: A theme/problem statement will be revealed on-site
Teams have 3 hours to build a working solution
AI tools are encouraged - use ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot, Midjourney, or any AI platform
Create functional prototypes, apps, designs, or solutions using available AI technologies
events.tools: Any AI platform, design tools (Figma, Canva), code editors, or development frameworks

format: Top teams advance to final on-stage round
Topics: Technology, science, current affairs, general knowledge
rules: No mobile phones or electronic gadgets

structure: Topics revealed on-site (related to AI or Blockchain)

events.name: Competitive Programming Contest
rules: Plagiarism detection software will be used
Judged on test cases passed with penalties for incorrect submissions

events.name: The Big Hack - National Level 24hr Hackathon
events.eligibility: Open to all college students across India
howItWorks: Themes focus on open innovation - bring any idea to life!
developmentRules: All code must be written during the 24-hour period
Open-source libraries, frameworks, and APIs are encouraged
Commit code to Git repository (GitHub/GitLab) with judge access
codeOfConduct: Space is for building, not harassment
Take breaks and rest when needed!
